title: Betta Fish
body: Betta fish are known for their bright colors and long, flowing fins. They are territorial and prefer to be alone.

title: Goldfish
body: Goldfish are one of the most popular aquarium fish. They come in many varieties and can live for decades in proper conditions.

title: Guppy
body: Guppies are small, colorful freshwater fish that are easy to care for. They are livebearers and breed easily.

title: Angelfish
body: Angelfish are graceful and elegant freshwater fish that prefer tall tanks. They can be semi-aggressive.

title: Clownfish
body: Clownfish are saltwater fish known for their symbiotic relationship with sea anemones and vibrant orange and white color.
